issue.title: Fix #1023

issue.body: As per title, fix #1023: delegate `writeStartArray()` for all relevant cases.

body: @honhimW I fixed this in `2.15` branch, but there's no test for it yet. Would be great if you could build locally `2.15.1-SNAPSHOT` and verify, or (if possible) maybe provide a compact test case?
Thanks for your reply, but i think it's hard to test without databind-module.

> Thanks for your reply, but i think it's hard to test without databind-module.

we could put a test in jackson-databind project

@honhimW Yes, adding tests in jackson-databind where necessary is fine.

Also: I released 2.15.1 yesterday so testing should be easier now.

issue.title: Upgrade to jackson 2.15
issue.body:
This allows us to remove a lot of custom code. Unfortunately we need to go all the way to Jackson 2.15 to pick up this fix:
https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-core/issues/1023
